title: Soul Siphon
description: Get all four books of the Soul Stones Origins series at a limited-time price of 99c   Once you cross the line, there's no turning back.  Being king isn't at all what Alexander Drygo expected. Negotiating with aggressive advisors and hostile kingdoms is one thing, but when his beloved lies at death's door, he'll do anything - even forsake those he's sworn to protect - to find a cure.  Receiving word of a magical stone with the power to heal her, he embarks on an epic adventure to retrieve it. When mythical beasts, scheming elves, and even enemy kingdoms stand in his way, he'll stop at nothing to get what he needs to save his wife's life.  Will Alexander destroy lives, betray loyalties and ruin peace forever? Or will he realize what he's doing before it's too late?  Join Alexander Drygo on a journey of love, loss, and madness told through the eyes of those closest to him.  Soul Siphon is a collection of novellas, including an exclusive, never-before-released story, Sentinels of the Stone.  Fans of R.A. Salvatore, Brandon Sanderson, and Sarah J. Maas will love this epic sword and sorcery adventure.  Books in the Soul Siphon collection: Midnight Blade Kingsbane Ash and Steel Sentinels of the Stone
author: T.L. Branson
